title: ISic000372. I.Sicily inscription 000372
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus)
L(ucius) ((·)) Silius ((·)) Dius
fecit ((·)) Siliae
Tychen[i] ma-
5tri ((·)) carissim<a>e
b(ene) ((ivy-leaf)) m(erenti)

Apparatus criticus

Text from CIL; Ferrara p.358 : TYCHEN traditur

English translation

To the gods of the underworld. Lucius Silius Dius erected (this) for Silia Tyches, his dearest, well-deserving mother

commentary
